import React, { Component } from 'react'; import 'font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css'; import axios from "axios"; class Addcoin extends Component { constructor (props) { super(props); this.state = { name: '', symbol: '', market_cap: '', price: '', description: '', website: '', telegram: '', twitter: '', discord: '', } } handleUserInput (e) { const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; this.setState({[name]: value}); } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); const data = { name: this.state.name, symbol: this.state.symbol, description: this.state.description, market_cap: this.state.description, price: this.state.description, website: this.state.description, telegram: this.state.telegram, twitter: this.state.twitter, discord: this.state.discord, } axios.post('http://localhost:8000/api/coins', { data }).then( res=>{ console.log(res); console.log(res.data); //window.location = "/retrieve" //This line of code will redirect you once the submission is succeed }) } render() { return (

); } } export default Addcoin;
